video.title: Rehab Addict Collection
video.synopsis: Pushing her crew and taking on the usual litany of old-house headaches, Nicole Curtis brings historic homes in Detroit and Minneapolis back to life.

episodes.synopsis: Nicole takes on a run-down, 1902 Victorian-style home. But when her contractor walks off the job, she tries to keep up the renovation work on her own.
episodes.title: Bathroom Rehab to Impress

episodes.synopsis: Frustrated by unreliable contractors and shoddy work, Nicole turns to her skilled carpenter brother and cousin for help.
episodes.title: Woodworking Miracles

episodes.synopsis: Tensions rise as creative minds clash when Nicole works with her brother and cousin to transform the cramped kitchen.
episodes.title: Kitchen Confusion

episodes.synopsis: To start a buzz in the Minnehaha neighborhood, Nicole first creates curb appeal with ambitious landscaping, painting and concrete work.
episodes.title: Curb Appeal Crackdown

episodes.synopsis: When the lights finally go on and the water flows, the walls go up throughout the house, allowing Nicole to complete her entryway restoration.
episodes.title: Entryway Dreams

episodes.synopsis: The upstairs guest bathroom and main-floor powder room are in horrible shape. But underneath the grime is character you just can't buy.
episodes.title: The Trouble with Tile

episodes.synopsis: Nicole's plan for the 1916 mansion is to build out the dark and dingy old cellar, adding nearly 1,000 square feet of new living space.
episodes.title: Nikki's Underground Rehab

episodes.synopsis: Every old house has its quirks, and for Nicole's grand Minneapolis mansion, it's the garage.
episodes.title: Garage 2.0

episodes.synopsis: Nicole is a tough-talking, hard-working entrepreneur but indulges her most glamorous fantasy in the master suite.
episodes.title: Master Suite Makeover

episodes.synopsis: One of the great old features of Nicole's big house in Minneapolis is the dining room.
episodes.title: Dining Room Detail

episodes.synopsis: Going on year two, Nicole tackles the most important room in the house -- the kitchen -- and restores the house's stunning marble tile floors.
episodes.title: Kitchen Design Dilemmas

episodes.synopsis: Nicole painstakingly paints the border around her favorite feature in the house: an amazing living room fireplace.
episodes.title: A Living Room to Remember

episodes.synopsis: After transforming a house from a monstrosity into an elegant mansion, Nicole holds her first open house and gets to hear what the neighbors think.
episodes.title: Total Restoration

episodes.synopsis: Nicole takes on another design project while waiting for the Minnehaha house to sell.
episodes.title: Bathroom Beautification

episodes.synopsis: Continuing her work on Adam and Rachael's home, Nicole restores the living room's beat-up hardwoods and replaces a set of built-ins.
episodes.title: Living Room Overhaul

episodes.synopsis: Nicole is under the gun to finish Adam and Rachael's kitchen renovation while they're on their honeymoon.
episodes.title: Kitchen Countdown

episodes.synopsis: With the Minnehaha house still on the market, Nicole decides to put her own house up for sale in hopes that it'll sell faster.
episodes.title: Garage Door Greatness

episodes.synopsis: After discovering a house she can purchase for just $1, Nicole buys in a historic neighborhood and sets out on her most ambitious project yet.
episodes.title: Shoebox Bathroom

episodes.synopsis: With the green light to start work on the Dollar House, Nicole's first project is a major one: lifting the house to fix the crumbling foundation.
episodes.title: Faulty Foundation

episodes.synopsis: Nicole demos her heart out and focuses on the disgusting kitchen space and adding a half bathroom to the first floor.
episodes.title: Bugs, Birds and Bad Plumbing

episodes.synopsis: Restoring the first floor of the Dollar House continues as Nicole uncovers hardwood floors throughout the living and dining rooms.
episodes.title: A Mantle to Remember

episodes.synopsis: Heading up to the second floor, Nicole takes on the bathroom -- one of the house's dirtiest and grimiest rooms -- and brings it down to the studs.
episodes.title: Bathroom Rebuild

episodes.synopsis: Ever closer to finishing up the interior of the Dollar House, Nicole works in the bedrooms to put up all new walls and ceilings.
episodes.title: Floors, Floors, Floors

episodes.synopsis: Moving outside, Nicole cleans up the debris in the yard and comes up with a plan to use salvaged materials to create a cute backyard oasis.
episodes.title: Salvaged Back Yard

episodes.synopsis: Nicole looks to neighboring houses for inspiration as she finishes the front porch and figures out how to repair the roof.
episodes.title: Total Transformation
